entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:16 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain or periods of snow changing to periods of snow before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:45 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
